alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead; Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 2:41PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Madison, southeastern Beaverhead and south central Gallatin Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 241 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 22 miles south of Virginia City to 16 miles north of Kilgore. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... West Yellowstone, Raynolds Pass and Yellowstone Village. This includes the following highways... Highway 191 between mile markers 1 and 10, and between mile markers 31 and 44. Highway 287 between mile markers 1 and 33. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
